text: Laura Boldrini, (; born 28 April 1961) is an Italian politician and former United Nations official. She was President of the Chamber of Deputies of Italy. She was the Spokesperson to the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR) for Southern Europe. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the Chamber of Deputies (Italy) Category:United Nations officials Category:Italian journalists Category:Politicians from Marche
title: Laura Boldrini
